page.title: 16Light Industry
page.content: There is an{industrial estate}on the northen outskirts of Tideswell.Here small businesses with workshops have been set up.These include a metal fabrication firm,plastic extrusions,a bakery making Derbyshire Oatcakes, a printing works,a garden supplies factory, a cabinet maker, and factories which make trailers and other farm implements, a firm which reclaims precious metals ,a pottery and a plastic factory both of which make garden pots. This small estate was started about 1980. { Other businesses}(apart from shops) include vehicle repair shops,a small glove factory, a factory making specialised mountaineering equipment which is exported all over the world, a joiner's workshop and a wood turnery.
